message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'd find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $18,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is closer to its true value. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately I am unable to go above $12,000 for the product. Is there any way we could reach an agreement within my budget?
